title: The screen does not rotate automatically
answer:
Check whether you have enabled the automatic screen rotation function. 

 Open the notification panel and select ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=96669) to turn on the automatic screen rotation function. 

 The screen does not rotate when using some third-party apps. 

 Check whether the app supports the tilt sensor. 

 Deleting some system files by accident may cause the screen to stop rotating automatically. You are recommended to restore the phone to factory settings or update the system after backing up important data. 

 Go to the [Huawei Downloads Page](http://consumer.huawei.com/en/support/downloads/index.htm%22 \o %22 ) and download the software update package. Refer to the update guide in the package before completing the update.
